meaningMnemonic: You <radical>stop</radical> a <radical>spoon</radical> from moving by tying it with <radical>thread</radical> that's <kanji>purple</kanji>. The spoon wouldn't stop moving around, so you had to use your favorite purple thread to make it stop. It's the strongest thread you have.
readingMnemonic: You have to use all of your purple thread, and now you need more. You go into the back yard and call over your <kanji>purple</kanji> <reading>shee</reading>p (し).
